name: Layers of Insanity
description: Layers of Insanity has a survival aspect to it and we have taken ideas and inspiration from the early classics and more such as Resident Evil and Silent Hill and Limbo. The main character whom the player will be controlling is a young teen at the age of 15.The boy awakes in his house, but everything is amiss.No one is in, and it's dead silent. With only the wind and rain hitting of the house.The boy gets up and starts exploring the house looking for his parents and his sister.
